00027 #define     NUM_SEC_PER_STRATEGIC_TURN                            ( NUM_SEC_IN_MIN * 15 ) // Every fifteen minutes
00028 
00029 
00030 UINT32            guiLastStrategicTime = 0;
00031 UINT32            guiLastTacticalRealTime = 0;
00032 
00033 
00034 void StrategicTurnsNewGame( )
00035 {
00036       // Sync game start time
00037       SyncStrategicTurnTimes( );
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 void SyncStrategicTurnTimes( )
00042 {
00043       guiLastStrategicTime =  GetWorldTotalSeconds( );
00044       guiLastTacticalRealTime =  GetJA2Clock( );
00045 }
00046 
00047 void HandleStrategicTurn( )
00048 {
00049       UINT32      uiTime;
00050       UINT32      uiCheckTime;
00051 
00052       // OK, DO THIS CHECK EVERY ONCE AND A WHILE...
00053       if ( COUNTERDONE( STRATEGIC_OVERHEAD ) )
00054       {
00055             RESETCOUNTER( STRATEGIC_OVERHEAD );
00056 
00057             // if the game is paused, or we're in mapscreen and time is not being compressed
00058             if( ( GamePaused() == TRUE ) ||
00059                         ( ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) && !IsTimeBeingCompressed() ) )
00060             {
00061                   // don't do any of this
00062                   return;
00063             }
00064 
00065             //Kris -- What to do?
00066             if( giTimeCompressMode == NOT_USING_TIME_COMPRESSION )
00067             {
00068                   SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( TIME_COMPRESS_X1 );
00069             }
00070 
00071 
00072             uiTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00073 
00074             // Do not handle turns update if in turnbased combat
00075             if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED ) && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00076             {
00077                   guiLastTacticalRealTime = uiTime;
00078             }
00079             else
00080             {
00081                   if ( giTimeCompressMode == TIME_COMPRESS_X1 || giTimeCompressMode == 0 )
00082                   {
00083                         uiCheckTime = NUM_REAL_SEC_PER_TACTICAL_TURN;
00084                   }
00085                   else
00086                   {
00087                         // OK, if we have compressed time...., adjust our check value to be faster....
00088                         if( giTimeCompressSpeeds[ giTimeCompressMode ] > 0 )
00089                         {
00090                           uiCheckTime = NUM_REAL_SEC_PER_TACTICAL_TURN / ( giTimeCompressSpeeds[ giTimeCompressMode ] * RT_COMPRESSION_TACTICAL_TURN_MODIFIER );
00091                         }
00092                   }
00093 
00094                   if ( ( uiTime - guiLastTacticalRealTime ) > uiCheckTime )
00095                   {
00096                         HandleTacticalEndTurn( );
00097 
00098                         guiLastTacticalRealTime = uiTime;
00099                   }
00100             }
00101 
00102       }
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 void HandleStrategicTurnImplicationsOfExitingCombatMode( void )
00107 {
00108       SyncStrategicTurnTimes();
00109       HandleTacticalEndTurn( /*GetWorldTotalSeconds()*/ ); // doesn't take parameters
00110 }
